content.rendered:
Directed by Palash Muchal

Written by Palash Muchal

Star Rajpal Naurang Yadav (Shiva). Rubina Dilaik (Madhu). Hiten Tejwani (Satya). Swastik Tiwari (Chintu). Kulbhushan Kharbanda

Language Hindi

Producers Kasim Ansari. Deepak Gupta. Vicky Mathur

Production Pal Music & Films
